channel.title: Crowdfunding Archives - VNN
channel.description: Everything about virtual voices, just one click away!

item.title: New VOICEROID by TOKYO6 Announced, Koharu Rikka!
item.dc:creator: Infoholic
item.description:
Concept art by Nari Teshima (@_17meisai23) Koharu Rikka (小春六花) is an upcoming VOICEROID voice library being crowdsourced and developed by TOKYO6 Entertainment. Announced a few days ago, on the 16th, big plans are in store for this cute gal. Rikka’s introductory video About Rikka マスコットキャラクター"ラキストン(LAKISTON)"#小春六花 pic.twitter.com/dbcMpIbb8o— TOKYO6 Infomation (@tokyo6info) May 16, 2020 Rikka is a …

The post New VOICEROID by TOKYO6 Announced, Koharu Rikka! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Koharu Rikka (小春六花) is an upcoming VOICEROID voice library being crowdsourced and developed by TOKYO6 Entertainment. Announced a few days ago, on the 16th, big plans are in store for this cute gal.

About Rikka

Rikka is a high-school sophomore, designed by Teshima Nari (手島nari), and voiced by Yoshino Aoyama. She’s 160 cm tall, her birthday is May 16th, and her companion is a teddy bear named LAKISTON.

About TOKYO6

TOKYO6 Entertainment was formed by Akasakov, a former VOCALOMAKETS team member. This will be their first project and is definitely an exciting one. If crowdfunding is successful, TOKYO6 plans to create a singing library, live appearances, and much more!

The Crowdfunding

The official page for the campaign is hosted on GreenFunding. It will be updated as time progresses and the campaign is launched on the 28th of this month.

As experienced VOICEROID crowdfunders, the company behind Tohoku Zunko (SSS LLC), will be handling the actual fundraising portion for TOKYO6. They hope to raise ￥7,000,000 JPY for the project which will cover the VOICEROID development, as well as 400 exVOICE samples.

￥500 JPY

  • Early access to Rikka illustrations.
  • a Thank-You card from Rikka.

￥5,000 JPY

  • Previous rewards
  • Exclusive exVOICE rewards

￥30,000 JPY

  • Previous rewards
  • Koharu Rikka VOICEROID Library
  • One T-shirt
  • An acrylic keychain
  • A postcard
  • A LAKISTON badge.

￥60,000 JPY

  • Previous rewards
  • A personalized thank you audio-message.
  • Two autographed postcards: one from Teshima Nari and one from Yoshino Aoyama

￥200,000 JPY

  • Previous rewards
  • An autographed copy of Rikka’s VOICEROID Library, signed by Teshima Nari and Yoshino Aoyama
  • Invitation to an exclusive birthday-party event. (This reward is limited to ten people.)

Links

Crowdfunding Link (updated when crowdfunding goes live)

The post New VOICEROID by TOKYO6 Announced, Koharu Rikka! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Meiko and Kaito Life Size Statue Crowdfunding
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
A few days ago, it was announced that crowdfunding for a life size Meiko and Kaito statue would begin soon. Now, we have all the details! It’s a great way to celebrate Meiko and Kaito’s 15th anniversary. Illustration The illustration will be drawn by iXima. At the moment we only have a sketch but the …

The post Meiko and Kaito Life Size Statue Crowdfunding appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A few days ago, it was announced that crowdfunding for a life size Meiko and Kaito statue would begin soon. Now, we have all the details! It’s a great way to celebrate Meiko and Kaito’s 15th anniversary.

Illustration

The illustration will be drawn by iXima. At the moment we only have a sketch but the full illustration will be revealed soon!

Crowdfunding

The crowdfunding will begin on February 17th, 2020, at 17:00 and will close on April 19th, 2020, at 23:59 (times are in JST). There’s plenty of opportunity to gather up some money to help with the crowdfunding!

The crowdfunding itself will take place on the site “ACT NOW” – you will need to register an account. If  you’re interested in registering now, you can do so here!

If the goal amount is reached, Meiko will be unveiled at this years Magical Mirai 2020 and Kaito will be displayed at an official event in 2021. They also plan to have a life size statue of all 6 characters together. If the amount exceeds the goal, the crowdfunding will still be open and all extras will go towards future activities for Meiko and Kaito. Let’s try and get it as high as we can!

Rewards

Of course with every crowdfunding campaign, there are many cool items for our backers!

3000 Yen (Unlimited Slots)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Meiko and Kaito Clear File (one of each)
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)

15,115 Yen (Unlimited Slots)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Meiko Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Meiko Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Meiko
  • Meiko Sticker by iXima

15,217 Yen (Unlimited Slots)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Kaito Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Kaito Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Kaito
  • Kaito Sticker by iXima

30,000 Yen (Limited to 15)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Meiko Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Meiko Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Meiko
  • Two Meiko Stickers by iXima
  • Original Tokkuri and Ochoko
  • Your name on the Statue stand

30, 000 Yen (Limited to 15)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Kaito Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Kaito Course Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Kaito Course
  • Two Kaito Course Stickers by iXima
  • Original Tokkuri and Ochoko
  • Your name on the Statue stand

50,000 Yen (Limited to 10)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Meiko Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Meiko Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Meiko
  • Three Meiko Stickers (iXima, V3 Logo and V1 Logo)
  • Original Tokkuri and Ochoko
  • Your name on the Statue stand
  • Magical Mirai 2020 entry in Osaka(8/9th) and a special visit with Meiko Haigō (1 person)
  • Signed Shikishi with your name by Meiko Haigō

50,000 Yen (Limited to 10)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Kaito Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Kaito Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Kaito
  • Three Kaito Stickers (iXima, V3 Logo and V1 Logo)
  • Original Tokkuri and Ochoko
  • Your name on the Statue stand
  • Magical Mirai 2020 entry in Osaka(8/9th) and a special visit with Naoto Fūga (1 person)
  • Signed Shikishi with your name by Naoto Fūga

Feeling Course (Unlimited)

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Statue name

If you purchase a course that allows you to have your name on the statue along side another course, your name on the figure will be bigger depending on number of people who do so.

The product may differ from what you see on the picture.

Overseas shipment will not be accepted, it is recommended that you use a forwarding service if you wish to do so.

If all limited courses have been purchased, they may add extra during the crowdfunding campaign if there are enough request for more.

Twitter Hashtag

They will be having a dedicated Twitter hashtag that you may use for the event. The hashtag is #MK15th_project  and will be checked everyday in order to make it a community project!

 

Stay tuned to VNN for any update on this project!

Source: Piapro Blog

The post Meiko and Kaito Life Size Statue Crowdfunding appeared first on VNN.

item.title: TBK Launches a Crowdfunding Campaign For the Album “Kitsune no Koe #1”!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
If there is something we always love to support, it’s various artist creations, and when TBK launched her own crowdfunding campaign for a whole new album that is filled with awesome VOCALOID covers. we couldn’t help but be excited for it! A Must-have Vocaloid EP! After the success of her first album “Polymorphose“, TBK makes …

The post TBK Launches a Crowdfunding Campaign For the Album “Kitsune no Koe #1”! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
If there is something we always love to support, it’s various artist creations, and when TBK launched her own crowdfunding campaign for a whole new album that is filled with awesome VOCALOID covers. we couldn’t help but be excited for it!

A Must-have Vocaloid EP!

After the success of her first album “Polymorphose“, TBK makes a comeback with a new album titled “Kitsune no Koe #1” and it is illustrated by the talented illustrator Daria for Japan Expo 2019. it features six different tracks performed by some of our favorite virtual singers, this album is scheduled to release in July of this same year and needs your help to become a reality!

Tracklist

Showing off a short but memorable tracklist, this album features not only very popular vocaloid songs, but also some french gems originally sang by VoxWave’s very own virtual singer ALYS, an enchanting singing character that TBK helped giving life! Let’s have a look at the songs together!

  1. “+REVERSE“, composed by niki
  2. “Senbonzakura“, composed by WhiteFlame (Physical Edition Only)
  3. “Lyrical Stabilizer“, composed by Police Piccadilly
  4. “Nouvel Eden“, composed by Sumashu
  5. “Scissorhands“, composed by Nem (Physical Edition Only)
  6. “Un désir si ardent“, composed by Anthony Lo Re

Having such an amazing tracklist, we couldn’t help but support this project after all!

Tiers and Rewards

Of curse we are going to choose between a variety of tiers and their own included rewards! We will see pins, t-shirts and postcards featuring Daria’s artwork alongside a special double-sided keychain illustrated by Annabel.

With so many awesome goods, donating for the project should be indeed perfect for any TBK fan! Her original character is also exceptionally cute after all, isn’t it? If you are interested, take a look at the reward tiers below!

  • Thank you (€5) You contribute to the making of Kitsune no Koe #1!
  • NUMERIFOX (€10) Previous reward, Digital CD Kitsune no Koe #1, Digital postcard and Hall of Fame (your name in the booklet). (Signing available)
  • INARI (€15) Previous rewards, Physical CD “Kitsune no Koe #1”, postcard, badge (38mm) and 1 lottery ticket. (Signing available and shipping to Europe included)
  • KITSUNETSUKI (€25) NUMERIFOX rewards, the 2 physical CDs “Kitsune no Koe #1”  and “Polymorphose”, postcard of your choice, badge (38mm) of your choice and 1 lottery ticket. (Signing available and shipping to Europe included)
  • TAISHA  (€50) INARI rewards, Keychain, T-shirt and 2 lottery tickets. (Signing available and shipping to Europe included)
  • PACK “KYUUBI (€100) Previous rewards, 1 personal live session, 1 bonus song and 2 lottery tickets. (Signing available and shipping to Europe included)

Note: The lottery ticket gives you a chance to win a 70x50cm forex frame of Kitsune no Koe #1 illustration.

Goals

This crowdfunding campaign is being held via Ulule’s platform and has currently reached its main goal of €1800, however, there are still plenty of prizes and stretch goals we can still reach! Let’s have a look at them together!

  • 1800€ Goal Physical edition of the album is funded!
  • 2070€ Goal More pages will be added to the booklet (instead of 4, we get 12 additional pages) in order to include all of the lyrics and their french translations!
  • 2700€ Goal Every backer that chooses to get the physical reward will also get an additional postcard!
  • 3060€ Goal Every backer that chooses to get the physical reward will also get an additional sticker sheet
  • 3510€ Goal Every artist that contributed to the project will get a bonus remuneration and the keychains will get bigger(from 5 cm to 7 cm)!
  • 4050€ Goal Every backer that picked the “TAISHA” reward will get a pin!

At the time of this writing, the project has reached €2711, reaching its third stretch goal, but there is still a lot more we can get from it so we should definitely keep supporting it and donating!

How to Donate

Did we spark your interest in the project perhaps? Then you should totally consider donating for the cause, so that the artist can make it into reality!
You can do it through Ulule’s crowdfunding campaign page clicking here!

We will keep an eye on TBK’s future project as well as this very one, looking forward to even more amazing covers from this talented singer!

In the meanwhile, don’t forget to stay tuned with us on VNN for any news about your favorite Virtual Singers!

Ulule Crowdfunding Campaign Page
TBK on Twitter

The post TBK Launches a Crowdfunding Campaign For the Album “Kitsune no Koe #1”! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VOCALOID Album Collection “Interface” Kickstarter is Live!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
If you are fans of Circus-P, Nostraightanswer and EmpathP, you will absolutely love to know that they plan to release a special VOCALOID Album collection together. However, they need your help to make this possible and launched a crowdfunding campaign via Kickstarter to make it a reality! About the Project If there is anything that …

The post VOCALOID Album Collection “Interface” Kickstarter is Live! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
If you are fans of Circus-P, Nostraightanswer and EmpathP, you will absolutely love to know that they plan to release a special VOCALOID Album collection together. However, they need your help to make this possible and launched a crowdfunding campaign via Kickstarter to make it a reality!

About the Project

If there is anything that brings us fans together is music, especially when it comes to songs that uses virtual singers as vocalists, so we cannot be more happy to also see oversea producers flourish and bringing us more and more tunes. These three artists are well known among the fans for their quality content and this album collection aims to unite three of their latest albums together.

  • “SYNTECH 0” by Nostraightanswer
  • “715” by Circus-P
  • “Ghost of Artificial Trees (English Language Edition)” by EmpathP

We guarantee you that these albums will win your heart with their songs and having a physical edition for them will make everything even more special!

Stretch Goals

While the minimum goal is $3,000 USD  by April 12th for the project to be funded, there are various different stretch goals that will add some extra bonuses to it, such as exclusive merchandise and additional albums from each of the producers. You can find them listed below!

  • Primary goal ($3,000 USD): This goal will allow them to manufacture all three albums in the collection. These albums will be packaged in digipak cases with 16-page full colored booklets containing lyrics, illustrations, and more! (Specifics vary from album to album.)
  • Interface merchandise upgrade ($5,000 USD): They will create album-themed merchandise featuring art by each album’s cover illustrator. These include, per album: one keychain, one to two buttons, and two to three stickers. If this stretch goal is met, these additional trinkets will be included exclusively with their respective albums at no additional cost. In addition, they will have t-shirts with album-related designs available as add-ons when filling out your backer surveys post-Kickstarter.
  • Additional album press by Nostraightanswer ($7,000 USD): If this second stretch goal is met, an additional album by nostraightanswer, as well as associated merchandise will be pressed as part of the Interface collection. This new album and its merch will be made available to all backers as an additional option or as a post-Kickstarter add-on via, Backerkit. This album is set to be released early 2020.
  • Additional album press by EmpathP  ($9,000 USD): If the third stretch goal is met, an additional album by EmpathP, as well as associated merchandise will be pressed as part of the Interface collection. Like with the previous stretch goal, this new album and its merch will be made available to all backers as an additional option or as a post-Kickstarter add-on via, Backerkit. This album is set to be released early 2020.
  • Additional album press by Circus-P ($11.000 USD): If this fourth and final stretch goal is met, an additional album by Circus-P, as well as associated merchandise will be pressed as part of the Interface collection. Like with the previous two stretch goals, this new album and its merch will be made available to all backers as an additional option or as a post-Kickstarter add-on via, Backerkit. This album is set to be released late 2019.

Tiers and Rewards

Tiers range from the classic $1 USD to $60 USD for all of the available rewards. Let’s check them out together!

  1. $1 USD Tier “Supporter”: You’ve got your foot in the door! You’re in! Selecting this tier will get you access to backer-only posts and polls, and your name is in the liner notes’ “Special Thanks” section!
  2. $20 USD Tier “Physical Album”: By pledging for this reward, you will receive your choice of one album from the “Interface” collection. You may choose between: SYNTECH 0, 715, or Ghosts of Artificial Trees.
  3. $40 USD Tier “Physical Album Duo”: By pledging for this reward, you will receive your choice of two albums from the “Interface” collection. You may choose between: SYNTECH 0, 715, or Ghosts of Artificial Trees.
  4. $60 Tier USD “Physical Album Trio”: By pledging for this reward, you will receive your choice of three albums from the “Interface” collection. You may choose between: SYNTECH 0, 715, or Ghosts of Artificial Trees.

All of the physical album tiers include the $1 USD reward as well!

You can pledge your donation to the cause and pick your tier via their Kickstarter campaign page.

Release Dates

Upon completion of the Kickstarter, these CDs are planned to be shipped between between May and June 2019. In case any other stretch goal gets funded, especially the additional albums, those  physical editions are scheduled to be released in early 2020. Should the Merch stretch goal be reached, each album’s exclusive merchandise will be shipped alongside their respective albums.

Official Links

Don’t forget to stay tuned with us on VNN for all the news not only of this project, but also about all your favorite Virtual Singers and artists!

“Interface” Kickstarter Campaign Page
Nostraightanswer on Twitter
Circus-P on Twitter
EmpathP on Twitter

The post VOCALOID Album Collection “Interface” Kickstarter is Live! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Crowdfunding for Tsuina the Ogre Hunter to Become a VOICEROID!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
You may remember about Tsuina the Ogre Hunter, the character voiced by Mai Kadowaki that was announced to get a chance to become a VOICEROID, just like the Tohoku sisters did in the past, thanks to a crowdfunding campaign. Well, this cute little character has launched her campaign via Greenfunding and she needs our help to reach …

The post Crowdfunding for Tsuina the Ogre Hunter to Become a VOICEROID! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
You may remember about Tsuina the Ogre Hunter, the character voiced by Mai Kadowaki that was announced to get a chance to become a VOICEROID, just like the Tohoku sisters did in the past, thanks to a crowdfunding campaign. Well, this cute little character has launched her campaign via Greenfunding and she needs our help to reach her goal!

Who is Tsuina-chan?

In case you don’t know her already, Tsuina the Ogre Hunter is a 14-year-old ogre hunter who always tries exorcising ogres during the Setsubon season, unfortunately often resulting unsuccessful. Her character was created by Saki Oohenri, the same creator of Hinomoto Oniko‘s meme (You may know also Oniko as the character from the song “HAKUMEI” composed by azuma. She previously used VY1 as vocal, then became an UTAU on her own). Tsuina is voiced by Mai Kadowaki and her fan and supporter can contribuite to her projects by donating money to her. Contributors to her project would receive her voice dramas files, her manga and a lot more. Tsuina became popular over time and even started promoting traditional Japanese culture and ceremonies!

Here below you can check her introduction video out!

Road to VOICEROID

Not long ago, Tsuina’s official Twitter account announced she would start a crowdfunding campaign in order to make her a VOICEROID voice bank. AHS Co. Ltd was enthusiast to confirm the project, but without any  further information about it. Now they finally launched her Greenfunding Campaign, with a stretch goal of 4,800,000 JPY. Tsuina will get a standard Japanese voice bank by default, but they may also be able to add an additional voice bank with Kansai dialect in case this crowdfunding is a success!

Tiers and rewards

Everyone can donate money to the campaign by choosing a specific Course. Based off of the the course you choose you will receive different prizes! Check them out below!

500 JPY Course

  • An email where she thanks you
  • A preview of the artwork that will be used on the packaging

5,000 JPY Course

  • Everything included in the previous course
  • 50 Additional unpublished voices

30,000 JPY Course

  • Everything included in the previous course
  • Her completed VOICEROID Software
  • A thank you recording (She will say your name there, alongside all the contributor’s ones!)
  • A Tapestry (60x180cm)
  • A guidebook about Nuo rituals and hōsōshis (updated version)
  • Voice drama episodes starting from episode 1 to 10 (A PDF transcription is included)

50,000 JPY Course

  • Everything included in the previous course
  • Special Sange flower petals
  • A commemorative Quocard  (Worth 1 JPY)     *It’s a prepaid card you can use to pay the amount value in some Japanese restaurants, stores and such
  • Voice drama episodes starting from episode 11 to 30 (A PDF transcription is included)

100,000 JPY Course (No more available)

  • Everything included in the previous course
  • An additional tapestry signed by Mai Kadowaki (Same design as the 30,000 JPY Course one)
  • Setsubon lucky charm with a takarabune illustration drawn on paper.

200,000 JPY Course (Limited to three people)

  • Everything included in the 100,000 JPY course
  • A Mystery Tour guided by Saki Oohenri (Travelling costs aren’t included)
  • An hand-drawn illustration by Saki Oohenri

600,000 JPY Course (Limited to three people)

  • Everything included in the 100,000 JPY course
  • An hand-drawn illustration by Saki Oohenri
  • The chance to partecipate during a Tsuina voice drama recording session (You may also be able to be included as well!)

At the moment this article was published the crowdfunding reached a donation amount of 4,466,000 JPY, getting closer and closer to it’s actual goal! Are you interested into donating to the project and let Tsuina finally become a VOICEROID? You can do so from her crowdfunding’s page on Greenfunding, it will end on February 20th at 11:59 PM JST so make sure to support the cause before the crowsfunding ends!

Conclusions

We cannot wait to hear more of Tsuina and her activities! Meanwhile, make sure to check out her official social medias, and remember to stay tuned with us for all the news about her!

Crowdfunding Campaign page on Greenfunding
Tsuina’s page on Fantia
Official Twitter Account
Official YouTube Channel

The post Crowdfunding for Tsuina the Ogre Hunter to Become a VOICEROID! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW ‘ARIA’ Crowdfunding
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Back in June a musical & live show took place in Enghien-les-Bains, France. This was something completely new from 1st Place, revolving around the themes of “Life,” “Love,” and “Peace,” ARIA promised to be an event that engaged the five senses, and challenged everything that you knew about live concerts.  It was a success as over 20 …

The post MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW ‘ARIA’ Crowdfunding appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Back in June a musical & live show took place in Enghien-les-Bains, France. This was something completely new from 1st Place, revolving around the themes of “Life,” “Love,” and “Peace,” ARIA promised to be an event that engaged the five senses, and challenged everything that you knew about live concerts.  It was a success as over 20 French medias and TV stations took up this performance.

The performance will grow as a “show that constantly grow and changes”, while doing various styles and new challenges under the support of fans. The start will be from “DMM VR THEARTER YOKOHAMA” in Japan.

This was not a one time event and they are making its next location in Japan on January 26th and 27th of 2019.

1st Place has opened a crowdfunding project through Makuake and are looking for your help. Although at the time of this writing the crowdfunding has surpassed its goal, you can still give your pledge as well as help reach the stretch goal. Even if you cannot go, you can still get some nice rewards. Secondly, the more support is shown for this show, the more likely we are to see the show in more locations in the future. If you would like to pledge then show your support!

There is a lot of rewards to be had, for the full list, click on the link to the crowdfunding here.

The post MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW ‘ARIA’ Crowdfunding appeared first on VNN.

item.title: ALYS Crowdfunding Campaign now live!
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
Though the ALYS crowdfunding campaign that we announced previously was set to go live on March 31st, some were able to access it beforehand, and the project reached 25% completion even before its announced launch date! Read on for information about the Au Delà du Rêve campaign, details on how you can contribute, and what rewards …

The post ALYS Crowdfunding Campaign now live! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Though the ALYS crowdfunding campaign that we announced previously was set to go live on March 31st, some were able to access it beforehand, and the project reached 25% completion even before its announced launch date!

Read on for information about the Au Delà du Rêve campaign, details on how you can contribute, and what rewards are on offer.

La campagne démarre officiellement le 31 mars, mais certains ont pu le voir, la page Ulule Au Delà du Rêve est déjà accessible: https://t.co/jB6P9QepoN

Le projet est déjà financé à 25% avant même le début de la campagne, merci infiniment à tout les contributeurs !

— VoxWave@AuDelàDuRêve (@VoxWave_Studio) March 30, 2018

Campaign Details

“Au Delà du Rêve” is both a literary and musical project, consisting of both an audio album and a collection of short stories.

The aim of the project is to create a narrative and build a universe around the character of ALYS.

With this project, VoxWave hopes to share the adventures of ALYS with an even wider audience than before.

The campaign goal is €5000 and, at the time of writing, the project is already 35% funded!

The crowdfunding campaign will come to an end on April 28th, 2018.

Rewards

There are various rewards on offer to the contributors of this campaign. Here is a summary of each of the reward tiers.

The following monetary value is in USD.

Support – $7 or more

  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”

Digital version $15 –  or more

  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReaders

Book – $21 or more

  • Physical copy of the book “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReaders

CD – $30 or more

  • The CD “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReaders

Book+ CD – $44 or more

  • Physical copy of the book “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The CD “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReader

Book + CD + Instrumental Version – $51 or more

  • Physical copy of the book “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The CD “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • The instrumental version of the Album “Au Delà du Rêve” as  well as in readable format.
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReaders

Cameo – $123 or more

  • Physical copy of the book “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The CD “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • The instrumental version of the Album “Au Delà du Rêve” as well as in readable format.
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReaders
  • A cameo in one of the illustrations “Dystopie” or “Utopie” (You may choose which one of the two you wish to have your cameo in, though please note that only 10 of each will be available.)

Figurine – $259 or more

  • Unpainted ALYS Figure

Colored Figurine – $444 or more

  • Painted ALYS figure

All in one – $512 or more

  • Physical copy of the book “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The CD “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • The instrumental version of the Album “Au Delà du Rêve” as  well as in readable format.
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReaders
  • Painted ALYS figure

All in one + Cameo – $574 or more

  • Physical copy of the book “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The CD “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • The instrumental version of the Album “Au Delà du Rêve” as  well as in readable format.
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReaders
  • A cameo in one of the illustrations “Dystopie” or “Utopie”
  • Painted ALYS figure

How to contribute

If you would like to contribute to the crowdfunding campaign, you can start by visiting the Ulule campaign page here.

Once there, you can sign in or register if you don’t already have an account.

To begin the process of pledging to the campaign, you must first select one of the reward tiers from the right-hand side of the page.

If you would prefer to not receive a reward for your pledge, simply click the last option in the list.

Once you select your reward tier, you may be prompted to select your country from a drop-down menu if your reward requires postage.

Please note that there is an extra charge for postage, which will be shown next to the country that you select.

Once you have made your selection, simply click the confirmation button at the bottom of the window.

If you do not already have an address and credit card details saved in your account, you will be prompted to enter these in the next page.

Once you confirm your details, you should see a thank you message as confirmation.

Please note that no funds will be taken from your account until the end of the campaign period and will only be processed if the campaign is successfully funded by that time.

Link

Ulule campaign page

The post ALYS Crowdfunding Campaign now live! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Reserve Your Copy of airbabe’s First Album on Vinyl Record!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
airbabe is a Japanese producer of original UTAU songs who will be releasing their first official album… on vinyl record! That’s right. On the Qrates crowdfunding site, you can now support airbabe by reserving your copy of their 8-track album entitled “Monogokoro (ものごころ)” on vinyl for ￥2,500 JPY (about $23.50 USD). Your copy will then …

The post Reserve Your Copy of airbabe’s First Album on Vinyl Record! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
airbabe is a Japanese producer of original UTAU songs who will be releasing their first official album… on vinyl record!

That’s right. On the Qrates crowdfunding site, you can now support airbabe by reserving your copy of their 8-track album entitled “Monogokoro (ものごころ)” on vinyl for ￥2,500 JPY (about $23.50 USD). Your copy will then be shipped to you once the crowdfunding comes to an end, which will happen once it reaches 100 orders!

Check out the teaser trailer below!

The trailer can also be watched on Niconico here.

About the Crowdfunding Effort

The Qrates crowdfunding page for “Monogokoro” can be found here. When you visit it, you will be able to listen to the full version of airbabe’s song よあけまで (Yoake Made). The album will feature 8 songs sung by the UTAUs Namae no Nai Ko, Nizimine Kakoi, Number Bronze, and ORIGAMI-I.

A total of 100 copies of the vinyl version of the album are available, and the crowdfunding project will conclude once all 100 copies are reserved and shipped out to their buyers. You can click here to see how much it will cost to ship to your country. Those who reserve a copy will even be able to download HQ digital versions of each of the 8 songs contained in the album.

At the time of this article’s writing, there are 90 remaining vinyl copies.

Why Vinyl?

airbabe explains, “I wanted to create something that would reach a broader customer base, one that doesn’t usually listen to VOCALOID music. Even if this crowdfunding doesn’t end in success, I would still like for more people to know that it happened at all, so I hope everyone reading this can help spread the word on this project.”

Tracklist

Note: All translated song titles are unofficial.

Side-A

  1. ≪はなひらく≫ (Hana Hiraku, “Flower Bloom”) feat. Namae no Nai Ko, Nizimine Kakoi
  2. ≪まちわびる≫ (Machiwabiru, “Sick of Waiting”) feat. Namae no Nai Ko, Nizimine Kakoi
  3. ≪ものごころ≫ (Monogokoro, “Awareness”) feat. Namae no Nai Ko
  4. ≪よあけまで≫ (Yoake Made, “Until Daybreak”) feat. Namae no Nai Ko, Nizimine Kakoi

Side-B

  1. ≪さがす≫ (Sagasu, “Search”) feat. Number Bronze, ORIGAMI-I
  2. ≪しとね≫ (Shitone, “Cushion”) feat. Namae no Nai Ko, Nizimine Kakoi
  3. ≪ゆるす≫ (Yurusu, “Forgive”) feat. Namae no Nai Ko
  4. ≪やすむ≫ (Yasumu, “Rest”) feat. Namae no Nai ko, Nizimine Kakoi

Official Links

For more information on airbabe and their works, check out the sites below, and stay tuned to VNN’s YouTube channel for official uploads of the album songs!

airbabe’s Official Site

airbabe’s YouTube Channel

airbabe’s Niconico Account

airbabe’s Facebook Page

Qrates Crowdfunding Site for “Monogokoro“

The post Reserve Your Copy of airbabe’s First Album on Vinyl Record! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Support the 2nd Yuzuki Yukari Racing Crowdfunding Effort!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
The Yuzuki Yukari Racing Project had an absolutely action-packed 2017. Fans of Yuzuki Yukari quickly fell in love with this new brand new take on the beloved VOCALOID and VOICEROID character from VOCALOMAKETS and AHS, and helped the project’s first crowdfunding effort on Readyfor reach its ￥2,000,000 JPY goal in just four days, eventually capping it off …

The post Support the 2nd Yuzuki Yukari Racing Crowdfunding Effort! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The Yuzuki Yukari Racing Project had an absolutely action-packed 2017. Fans of Yuzuki Yukari quickly fell in love with this new brand new take on the beloved VOCALOID and VOICEROID character from VOCALOMAKETS and AHS, and helped the project’s first crowdfunding effort on Readyfor reach its ￥2,000,000 JPY goal in just four days, eventually capping it off by raising more than double that amount!

 

Since then, the project has never stopped moving or growing. After unveiling the Yukari Racing itasha at VOCACON in 2016, the project and its members have competed at the Tsukuba Circuit, participated in the Winter ComiKet of that year, appeared in a Hagane Orchestra video game collaboration, competed again in the Motegi Championship Cup Race, made appearances at the Itasha Heaven, Niconico Cho Kaigi, and Koetsuki events in 2017, participated even more in the Winter and Summer Wonfes, the Summer and Winter ComiKet, and the VOC@LOID M@STER events of that year (where they also received their theme song), and finally topped the first year off by competing in the final round of the 2017 Super Taikyu season!

In short, the first year of life for Yuzuki Yukari Racing was practically overflowing with events and excitement! Granted, it would have been less anticlimactic if the rain hadn’t caused them to crash during the final Super Taikyu race, and have to retire from the race halfway through. But, in spite of that unfortunate accident, project organizer, Takahiro Watanabe, was still incredibly grateful for the chance to race, for their participation attracted a lot of media attention. He thanked all the fans and supporters who helped the Yuzuki Yukari Racing Project get so far in 2017, and promised to work even harder in 2018.

浅野RSさんに行って2018年の話をしてきました。
2018年も今回同様、変わらぬサポートを戴ける事になりました。
マシンの修復の為、近々一度点検に入ります。
しかし運転席側の激しいクラッシュにも関わらずドライバーが無傷なのは本当に不幸中の幸いです。#結月ゆかりレーシング pic.twitter.com/it28ClICRw

— ＨＡＹＡＴＯ@TAK.WATANABE (@tak_racing) October 24, 2017

“We’re back from the Asano Racing Service garage to talk about our 2018 plans.
It’s our pleasure to report that all the support that we’ve been shown will continue on into 2018 as well.
We’ll soon be assessing what must be done to fix her up.
Still, the fact that the driver wasn’t hurt in this awful driver-side crash was a mini-miracle.”

2nd Crowdfunding Campaign

Of course, in order to continue the project into 2018, they will need funds, and that’s where the 2nd Yuzuki Yukari Racing crowdfunding campaign comes in!

Click here to check out the new crowdfunding page on Readyfor.

Campaign Description

Thanks to the first crowding funding effort, the Yuzuki Yukari Racing team was able to compete in the Super Taikyu, create and sell all sorts of Racing Yukari merchandise, and even meet fellow Yukari fans. Hearing their words of encouragement and support has been a great source of strength and inspiration for the whole team.

Now, in order to do it all again in 2018, another crowdfunding effort is now underway! There are two main goals for the money raised through this year’s effort:

1. Compete again in the 2018 Super Taikyu

First, the team will need to fix up the Racing Yukari itasha to race again after the aforementioned crash. The funds raised through the crowdfunding page will be used to pay Asano Racing and J.I.O Create to repair the vehicle and redo the decals, and then will be used for continued maintenance and practice runs.

Their ultimate goal is to take another shot at the final Super Taikyu race this November 3rd and 4th at the Okayama International Circuit, and make up for last year’s unfortunate result. Watanabe also plans on competing at the Sportsland SUGO on April 28th and 29th, learning from the past experience and making this year’s Super Taikyu a victorious one for Yukari!

2. Create even more Racing Yukari merchandise

Outside of racing, the whole team had an amazing time meeting with fellow VOCALOID and VOICEROID fans at the many events that they attended last year. It brought them great joy to see so many people become interested in racing thanks to their activities. They hope to create even more opportunities to meet with such fans, and even give them the chance to ride in the Racing Yukari itasha.

Their second goal with the money raised in the crowdfunding effort is to continue making Racing Yukari merchandise. Having more goods to sell would enable them to attend more events and give fans more of what they want, both in the form of the racing spectacle, and in the form of merch that they can purchase.

Rewards

Like many crowdfunding campaigns, there are a variety of rewards that donors can earn. The bigger the donation, the better the reward! Below is what contributors to the 2018 Racing Yukari crowdfunding campaign can earn with the following donation amounts:

￥3,000 JPY (about $28 USD): Supporter Card

  • Plastic Yuzuki Yukari Racing supporter card with your own ID number
  • Yuzuki Yukari Racing supporter sticker

No amount limit.
Donors will receive this award sometime in May, 2018.
Donate and claim this reward here!

 

￥5,000 JPY (about $46 USD): Readyfor-Exclusive Acrylic Keychain

  • All of the above-mentioned rewards
  • SD Racing Yukari acrylic keychain

No amount limit.
Donors will receive this award sometime in May, 2018.
Donate and claim this reward here!

 

￥10,000 JPY (about $92 USD): Readyfor-Exclusive Card Holder

  • All of the above-mentioned rewards
  • IC Card-sized card holder

No amount limit.
Donors will receive this award sometime in May, 2018.
Donate and claim this reward here!

 

￥20,000 JPY (about $184 USD): Yuzuki Yukari Racing Sticker

  • All of the above-mentioned rewards
  • Yuzuki Yukari Racing car decal sticker (most suitable for a Honda Integra DC5)

No amount limit.
Donors will receive this award sometime in May, 2018.
Donate and claim this reward here!

 

￥30,000 JPY (about $276 USD): Replica Staff T-shirt

  • All of the above-mentioned rewards
  • Replica of the T-shirts worn by the Yuzuki Yukari Racing staff at racing circuits (design subject to change)

No amount limit.
Donors will receive this award sometime in May, 2018.
Donate and claim this reward here!

 

￥150,000 JPY (about $1,380 USD): Sticker Placement (small)

  • All of the above-mentioned rewards
  • The chance to have a 15 x 10 cm (about 6 x 4 in) sticker of your choice pasted on the Racing Yukari itasha that competes in the Super Taikyu (6 races in total)

No amount limit.
Donate and claim this reward here!

 

￥600,000 JPY (about $5,520 USD): Sticker Placement (large)

  • All of the above-mentioned rewards (except for the “Sticker Placement (small)” reward)
  • The chance to have a 60 x 60 cm (about 24 x 24 in) sticker of your choice pasted on the Racing Yukari itasha that competes in the Super Taikyu (6 races in total)

※Limited to 3 individuals (3 remaining at the time of this writing)
Donate and claim this reward here!

 

￥1,000,000 JPY (about $9,200 USD): Naming Rights

  • All of the above-mentioned rewards (except for the two “Sticker Placement” rewards)
  • The chance for your name or nickname (14-character limit) to be added to the Yuzuki Yukari Racing team’s list of entry names for all races over the next year (6 races in total)

※Limited to 1 individual (1 remaining at the time of this writing)
Donate and claim this reward here!

You can see a list of all donation options and their rewards by clicking here (you’ll need to sign up or log in with Facebook), and start donating!

At the time of this article’s writing, there are 41 days remaining for the crowdfunding project, and ￥795,000 JPY out of the goal of ￥2,000,000 JPY (39%) has been raised.

Information Source

2nd Yuzuki Yukari Racing Readyfor Crowdfunding Page
Takahiro Watanabe’s Official Twitter and Official Blog
Yuzuki Yukari Racing’s Official Twitter and Facebook

The post Support the 2nd Yuzuki Yukari Racing Crowdfunding Effort! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Support Tohoku Itako’s VOICEROID Crowdfunding Project!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
On Monday, November 13th, the Tohoku Itako VOICEROID project’s crowdfunding page opened, and started taking donations for Tohoku Itako‘s long-awaited official VOICEROID bank. The money collected would help fund development of her VOICEROID2 bank, and help her join her sisters, Tohoku Zunko and Tohoku Kiritan, as part of AHS Co.‘s official VOICEROID series lineup. And …

The post Support Tohoku Itako’s VOICEROID Crowdfunding Project! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
On Monday, November 13th, the Tohoku Itako VOICEROID project’s crowdfunding page opened, and started taking donations for Tohoku Itako‘s long-awaited official VOICEROID bank. The money collected would help fund development of her VOICEROID2 bank, and help her join her sisters, Tohoku Zunko and Tohoku Kiritan, as part of AHS Co.‘s official VOICEROID series lineup.

And within just 23 minutes of commencing, the crowdfunding campaign had already reached its original ￥4,500,000 JPY goal (about $39,975 USD)!

ありがとうございます＼(?ず・ω・だ?)／
なんと開始24分でゴール達成しましたﾟﾟﾟﾟヽ(´∀｀*)ﾉﾜｰｨヽ(*´∀｀)ﾉﾜｰｨhttps://t.co/gD7kI7dcKg pic.twitter.com/0Et990rAWP

— 東北ずん子?東北イタコボイロ化クラウドファンディング (@t_zunko) November 13, 2017

Thank you so much ＼(?ず・ω・だ?)／ We’ve reached our goal after just 24 minutes…ヽ(´∀｀*)ﾉﾜｰｨヽ(*´∀｀)ﾉﾜｰｨ

正確には開始23分で100％だったもようですヾ(❀╹◡╹)ﾉﾞhttps://t.co/gD7kI7dcKg pic.twitter.com/7WXZjgVtOt

— 東北ずん子?東北イタコボイロ化クラウドファンディング (@t_zunko) November 13, 2017

Correction. It took closer to 23 minutes for us to reach 100% of our goal ヾ(❀╹◡╹)ﾉ

It didn’t take long for the crowdfunding organizers to then create more stretch goals, all of which were also reached within the campaign’s first week. At the time of this writing, they have raised an unprecedented ￥22,355,000 JPY (about $200,916 USD) for Itako’s VOICEROID development, nearly 5 times its initial goal!

But while the project is now fully funded, it has not yet officially concluded, and there are still some nice rewards up for grabs for those who would still like to donate. Read on for details!

About Tohoku Itako

Tohoku Itako is described as a 19-year-old shaman (which is what “itako” literally means) who graduated at the top of her class in shamanism school, and is the eldest of the Tohoku sisters. She is contracted to a fox spirit who lives inside her body, and transformed her ears into fox ears. Her voice provider is the famed voice actress, Ibuki Kido.

Back in 2014, a successful crowdfunding effort was held on GREEN FUNDING to get UTAU voice banks developed for both Itako and her sister, Tohoku Kiritan. See below for her demo songs.

“Kuchiyose Ouse” by Hoken TaiikuP

“Kuro Hane” by Bakuha Mikan

“Itako Metal” by greAir

Crowdfunding for Itako’s VOICEROID Development

While the initial ￥4,500,000 JPY would fully fund Itako’s VOICEROID development, it would be just a straight up voice bank with a singular style, and no recorded voice samples. However, the 23-minute fulfillment of the crowdfunding’s initial goal quickly led to the addition of more stretch goals the very next day, which would add many more bells and whistles to her product.

These stretch goals are as follows:

￥10,500,000 JPY (about $93,266 USD): 1 new voice style* and 150 new voice samples** added

￥11,700,000 JPY (about $103,925 USD): 150 new voice samples added

￥16,200,000 JPY (about $143,896 USD): 1 new voice style added

￥17,400,000 JPY (about 154,555 USD): 150 new voice samples added

￥22,000,000 JPY (about $195,415 USD): 1 new voice style added

*Voice styles are parameters that change the voice type or emotion, such as “angry,” “sad,” or “whisper”

**Voice samples are set, pre-recorded phrases and expressions that users can easily access for quick use in a video or anything else that they desire

Examples:





Then on November 19th, just 5 days after these stretch goals were added, every single one was fulfilled!

イタコ姉さまボイロ化クラウドファンディング(◍•ᴗ•◍)本当に本当にありがとうございます✧.ﾟ٩(๑>◡<๑)۶:.｡♡
まさかまさか、１週間たたないうちに最終ゴールを達成するとは思っていませんでしたヽ(•̀ω•́ )ゝ✧https://t.co/gD7kI7dcKg pic.twitter.com/lbdizjyQ1P

— 東北ずん子?東北イタコボイロ化クラウドファンディング (@t_zunko) November 19, 2017

From all of us at Itako-neesama’s VOICEROID crowdfunding (◍•ᴗ•◍) Thank you so, so much! ✧.ﾟ٩(๑>◡<๑)۶:.｡♡
We never would have thought that we would achieve our final stretch goal within just one week! ヽ(•̀ω•́ )ゝ✧

達成しました！！！?????
えええええ！！！（笑）すごいすごい！
6日で2200万円集まるなんてぇ！∑(ﾟДﾟ)
皆さんのおかげです！私も収録全力で頑張ります！(^з^)https://t.co/LvOj30ln7w

— 木戸衣吹 (@ibuking_1114) November 20, 2017

They’ve done it!!!????? Ehhh!!! (lol) Amazing!
In just 6 days, they’ve raised ￥22,000,000 yen!∑(ﾟДﾟ)
This was all possible thanks to you! I’ll be doing my very best with the voice recording! (^з^)

Following the announcement that all stretch goals have been met, the crowdfunding page then mentioned that they will soon be preparing new illustrations and a Live2D model for Itako that users can download and utilize for free!

そしてそして、そんな中嬉しいお知らせが届きましたo(≧▽≦)o
イタコ姉さまのLive2Dモデルを現在作成してもらっています((o(*´∀`*)o))

イタコ姉さまの広がりがどんどん大きくなってきています(*•̀ᴗ•́*)و ̑̑

ベースイラストは @edomuraninico 先生、制作は @JORA_JORAEMON さんです(〃▽〃)ﾉ pic.twitter.com/CQbleCdN7a

— 東北ずん子?東北イタコボイロ化クラウドファンディング (@t_zunko) November 16, 2017

Up next, we’ve got an exciting announcement to make!o(≧▽≦)o
Itako-neesama’s Live2D model is now being made!((o(*´∀`*)o))

Itako-neesama’s popularity just grows and grows (*•̀ᴗ•́*)و ̑̑

The base illustration was provided by @edomuraninico, and the model was created by @JORA_JORAEMON (〃▽〃)ﾉ

さらに支援していただいた金額につきましては(๑╹◡╹๑)イラスト制作や新たなLive2Dモデル制作などにあてさせていただきますo(≧▽≦)o

— 東北ずん子?東北イタコボイロ化クラウドファンディング (@t_zunko) November 19, 2017

Now about what we’ll be doing with all the money raised (๑╹◡╹๑) We’ll be using some of it to create brand new illustrations and develop the Live2D model! o(≧▽≦)o

動くイタコ姉さま(*ゝ∀･*)b pic.twitter.com/wuZtSlV0Zq

— 東北ずん子?東北イタコボイロ化クラウドファンディング (@t_zunko) November 20, 2017

Itako-neesama in motion (*ゝ∀･*)b

Donor Rewards

As with many crowdfunding efforts, donors to the project could score some nice rewards depending on how much they donate. Please note that by now, many of the merchandise rewards are out of stock, but there are still some digital rewards that have no limit to the number of people who can claim them.

￥500 JPY (about $4.50 USD)

  • Early look at Tohoku Itako’s VOICEROID2 box art

￥5,000 JPY (about $44.45 USD)

  • The above-mentioned reward
  • Crowdfunding donor-exclusive voice data

“We’ll be giving you exclusive voice data that only donors to the crowdfunding project can obtain as a reward!”

￥30,000 JPY (about $266 USD) **OUT OF STOCK**

  • All of the above-mentioned rewards
  • Tohoku Itako’s VOICEROID software (after it’s complete)
  • Tohoku Itako fabric poster
  • Voiced thank-you message from Tohoku Itako (they will be recording each person’s name for the thank-you message, and sending them individually)

￥50,000 JPY (about $444 USD) **OUT OF STOCK**

  • All of the above-mentioned rewards, with your copy of Tohoku Itako’s VOICEROID software being autographed by Edomura Ninico
  • Tohoku Itako fabric poster (different from the ￥30,000 JPY reward), autographed by Edomura Ninico

￥100,000 JPY (about $889 USD) **OUT OF STOCK**

  • All of the above-mentioned rewards
  • Tohoku Itako fabric poster (different from the ￥50,000 JPY rewar), autographed by Edomura Ninico
  • Tohoku Zunko picture book (same reward from the Zunda Horizon crowdfunding campaign)

￥600,000 JPY (about $5334 USD) **OUT OF STOCK**

  • All of the above-mentioned rewards
  • Participation in a Tohoku Zunko business conference
  • A white plate with a Tohoku Itako illustration imprinted on it, newly-crafted right on the spot by Edomura Ninico

The extremely rapid success of Tohoku Itako’s VOICEROID crowdfunding project caught many people by surprise, including VNN. However, this early success confirms that Tohoku Itako’s VOICEROID2 software will soon be in development! Stayed tuned to VNN for any official updates and a release date announcement!

At the time of this writing, there are 18 days remaining until the Tohoku Itako VOICEROID Crowdfunding project concludes on December 11, 2017. You can donate to it here.

Links

Tohoku Itako VOICEROID GREEN FUNDING Page
Tohoku Zunko’s Official Twitter

The post Support Tohoku Itako’s VOICEROID Crowdfunding Project! appeared first on VNN.
